messages.subject: RE: [UnschoolingDiscussion] PROBLEM WITH UNSCHOOLINGTEENS@YAHOOGROUPS.COM (VERY IMPORTANT)
messages.msgSnippet: The Age of Consent for heterosexual activity is 16 in Australia as I
messages.messageBody:
<<Teens talk about sex. I gather most of them are over the legal age of
16?
Shyrley>>



The Age of Consent for heterosexual activity is 16 in Australia as I
recall, and I guess from your remark in UK also. However in the USA it
varies from State to State, and with or without parental consent, and
seems to be mostly 16 or 17 or 18. Young as 14 with parental consent in
some places. Homosexual varies from "illegal" to 18 to 21. I found
charts about worldwide ages when I Googled.

I hope if the teens don't like a thread they skip it, just like we might
on our list.

I wonder if the parent was concerned that there might be pedophiles
masquerading as Unschooling teens and posting to the list?

Robyn Coburn








[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: PROBLEM WITH UNSCHOOLINGTEENS@YAHOOGROUPS.COM (VERY IMPORTANT)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I m not sure who the parent of the teen is who started the Unschoolingteens@yahoogroups.com is and I don t have the time to go back into the archives to
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I'm not sure who the parent of the teen is who started the
Unschoolingteens@yahoogroups.com is and I don't have the time to go back into the archives to
find out who the parent is. So, I am sending this to the group in hopes the
proper person will read this.

I mean to sound prudish, but, my DD, 17, came to me tonight w/concerns over a
couple of posts that she really thought were/are inappropriate; I have to
agree. I have cut/pasted them to this group ONLY for the purpose that I am
HOPING the parent of the teen who started this group will read it. I KNOW the
teens like their privacy and all, BUT, I do think this needs to be moderated a
bit. Anyway, following are the post(s):

Subj:[unschoolingteens] Re: New Member... CALL ME SUZIE
Date:10/4/03 8:12:28 PM Eastern Daylight Time
From:suzzee6971@...
Reply-to:unschoolingteens@yahoogroups.com
To:unschoolingteens@yahoogroups.com
Sent from the Internet (Details)

Not only am I unschooled, but I am free to do what I please...
(HEHEHE INCLUDE HAVE SEX) not that you guys care...lol... anyway...
I wouldnt be surprised that it did turn into a parrot lovers
group... MY LIFE WAS TAKEN OVER BY MY PARROT!!! LOL

Subj:[unschoolingteens] Re: New Member... CALL ME SUZIE
Date:10/4/03 8:08:48 PM Eastern Daylight Time
From:birdgirl@...
Reply-to:unschoolingteens@yahoogroups.com
To:unschoolingteens@yahoogroups.com
Sent from the Internet (Details)


HI Suzie :) wow you have a 20 year old boyfriend!!! I parents wont
even let me date an 18 year old(not that I can date yet)
it seems this group is turning into a parrot lovers group too.

Courtney


Thanks for your attention to this!

Tracy
